text: Sergio Busquets i Burgos (born 16 July 1988) is a Spanish footballer who plays for Inter Miami and the Spanish national team. ==Club career statistics== http://soccernet.espn.go.com/player/_/id/121893/sergi-busquets?cc=4716 |- |2008/09 || rowspan="4"| FC Barcelona ||rowspan="3"| La Liga || 24 || 1 |- |2009/10||33||0 |- |2010/11||28||1 |- 85||2 ==Honours== ===Barcelona=== *La Liga (3): 2008–09, 2009–10, 2010–11 *Copa del Rey (1): 2008–09 *Supercopa de España (2): 2009, 2010, 2011 *UEFA Champions League (2): 2008–09, 2010–11 *UEFA Super Cup (1): 2009 *FIFA Club World Cup (1): 2009 ===Spain=== *FIFA World Cup (1): 2010 ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Catalonia Category:Sportspeople from Sabadell Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
title: Sergio Busquets
